data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Consumable Value Set
data.detailed_description:
A set of healing and support items.

Advanced Medicine Set 2
Advanced Medicine Set 3
Dragon Incense Set 2
Dragon Incense Set 3
Droplet Set 3
Droplet Set 4
Droplet Set 5
Gifts from Eryn
Monster Ingredients Set 2
Monster Ingredients Set 3
Rebellious Septian Set: Fire
Rebellious Septian Set: Water
Rebellious Septian Set: Wind
Sepith Set 3
Sepith Set 4
Sepith Set 5
Shining Pom Droplet Set 3
Shining Pom Droplet Set 4
Shining Pom Droplet Set 5
Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 3
Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 4
Shining Pom Droplet Value Set 5
Spirit Incense Set 2
Spirit Incense Set 3
U-Material Set 4
U-Material Set 5
U-Material Set 6
U-Material Set 7
U-Material Set 8
U-Material Set 9
Zeram Powder Set 2
Zeram Powder Set 3
Zeram Capsule Set 2
Zeram Capsule Set 3

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
